message.entry: Invalid frame name ''{0}'' in the transformation tree. Use the ''AvailableFrames'' property to see all valid frame names.
The ''{0}'' frame name is invalid. Remove the leading forward slashes.
Invalid frame names ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' in the transformation tree. Use the ''AvailableFrames'' property to see all valid frame names.

Unable to find the transformation between ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' at source time {2}. The given time is outside of the buffered time window. Increase the ''BufferTime'' of the transformation tree or use the timeout in ''getTransform'' to wait for a source time in the future.
The ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' frames are not connected in the transformation tree. Try waiting for the transformation to be available on the ROS network or check that the frame names are correct.
The transformation did not become available within {0} seconds. Try using a larger timeout value.
No valid transformation was found between ''{0}'' and ''{1}''.
The {0} message type is not supported for transformation. Try one of the supported types: {1}.
Invalid message type {0} on the /tf topic. Valid message types are: {1}.
''{0}'' 및 ''{1}'' 좌표 프레임 간의 회전 쿼터니언이 유효하지 않습니다. 이 쿼터니언은 tf 변환 트리에서 단위 쿼터니언으로 대체되었습니다.
변환 트리를 종료하는 중 오류가 발생했습니다.
getTransform 동작은 향후 릴리스에서 변경될 예정입니다. TARGETFRAME과 SOURCEFRAME만 지정되고 변환이 가능하지 않을 경우 getTransform은 오류를 표시하며 빈 TF를 반환하지 않습니다.
